scriptload_content.description: Searchable. Deobfuscated script content of script(s) loaded from the filesystem.  Requires Windows sensor, AMSI support via Windows 10/Server version 1703 or later  For more information see here

scriptload_content_length.description: Searchable. Character count of the deobfuscated script content of script(s) loaded from the filesystem.  Requires Windows sensor, AMSI support via Windows 10/Server version 1703 or later  For more information see here

scriptload_content_raw.description: Searchable. Raw script content of the script loaded from the filesystem without tokenization of special characters.  Requires Windows sensor, AMSI support via Windows 10/Server version 1703 or later  For more information see here

scriptload_count.description: Searchable. Count of scriptload events reported by the sensor since last initialization.  Requires Windows sensor or macOS sensor

scriptload_effective_reputation.description: Searchable. Effective reputation of the script file loaded by the process; applied by the sensor when the event occurred.  Requires Windows sensor or macOS sensor, and Enterprise EDR

scriptload_hash.description: Searchable. MD5 and/or SHA-256 hash(es) of the script file loaded by the process.  Requires Windows sensor or macOS sensor

scriptload_name.description: Searchable. Value-Searchable. Filesystem path of the script file loaded by the process.

scriptload_publisher.description: Searchable. Publisher name on the certificate used to sign the script file; reports signatures on Powershell scripts and .MSI/.MSP files.  Requires Windows sensor or macOS sensor

scriptload_publisher_state.description: Searchable. Value-Searchable. State of the loaded script(s)' digital signature(s); checks signatures on Powershell scripts and .MSI/.MSP files  Requires Windows sensor or macOS sensor

scriptload_type.description: The type of the scriptload operation
